name: Unlock the Pic
description:
Did you know, your brain is a muscle? Clever muscle, which one should be trained to be strong and healthy. Unlock the Pic is a perfect trainer, that helps you to train your clever muscle.

It begins with simple figures, that should be unlocked by moving your finger along a given path, and it becomes more difficult with each level.

Unlock the Pic is the perfect brain teaser, which can:

• Boost overall brain activity
• Increase your memory power
• Improve memory and brain processing speed
• Reduce boredom
• Improve concentration

Best regards, Unlock the Pic team.
